channel.title: Please please please please someone help
channel.description:
So i have the Mentios source and , yesterday it worked fine got some players,
Now when i run my client it loads to 92% then i get this in my cmd from the client [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/nwnal0.jpg[/img]
http://i42.tinypic.com/nwnal0.jpg

item.title: Please please please please someone help
item.dc:creator: @GNUd00d GNUd00d
item.description:
@GNUd00d wrote:

Now I’m no expert, but it would appear that you cant establish a socket to whatever the original source is trying to connect to. My guess is that whatever ‘it’ is does not exist anymore, as the connection was refused. is the source modified? I would imagine that at the time of original development they had a main sever or such that would do something like check logins, manage hosts, etc. Do a traceback and find what is causing that faulty connection. Unfortunately, it could really be anything causing it. I wish i could tell you more, it all just comes back to a bug hunt

Read full topic
item.source: Please please please please someone help
